column2: # Note that R can't use the "cardiac" variables at-base since they're strings.
# factor(sucess) converts success from string to levels.

glm(formula = factor(group) ~ A + W, family = binomial(link = logit), 
    data = cardiac.data)
Null deviance: 66.542  on 47  degrees of freedom
Residual deviance: 58.110  on 45  degrees of freedom
# Sprintf is used to make the output clearer.
sprintf("The deviance test value is %s", deviance)
sprintf("The deviance test p-value is %s", deviance_pval)
